segments.text: Have you had any medical experience in any hospital before coming here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I worked as a doctor at Beijing People's Hospital .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In what section did you work in the hospital ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I worked in the Infection Medicine Division .
segments.speaker: S2
